How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Use ServiceNow Flow Designer and Integration Hub to collect data from satellite feeds, weather APIs, and local fire departments. Now Platform dashboards would visualize fire risks, while Virtual Agent and Mobile App would send automated alerts to residents and emergency teams.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Integration with weather APIs (e.g., MeteoSpain), satellite imagery (Copernicus), and local emergency systems.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Access to real time environmental data, ensuring accuracy of AI predictions, and coordinating between multiple regional authorities for data sharing and response.
